name: WisQo
0:
”Alexa, turn on Living Room lights”
”Alexa, turn on my Bedroom”
”Alexa, turn off All Lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the WisQo skill for Alexa, you can now control your WisQo light switches with your voice.

To get started, select the “Enable Skill” button in the Alexa App. Link to your WisQo account by entering your WisQo account name and password. You can create a WisQo account on the free WisQo App with your email. 

To discover WisQo devices, just say, ”Alexa, discover my devices” or go to the Smart Home tab on the Alexa App and clicking on the Discover devices button. 

To control your devices, say “Alexa, turn on my Bedroom light”, or any unique name you give to the light. You can also create groups of devices in the Alexa App to control multiple devices at once. 

To change the name of the light, just go to WisQo App, update the name of the light. Then ask Alexa to discover devices again. The name will be updated on Alexa. 

Now, you can just enjoy living in the future with WisQo. 

Visit wisqo.com for more information on the WisQo skill for Alexa. 
Find Alexa enabled products by search WisQo on Amazon store.
